thread.title: Eibar coach Jos Mendilibar worried of 'explosive' threat of Ghana ace Mubarak Wakaso ahead of Las Palmas tie
thread.title_full: Eibar coach Jos Mendilibar worried of 'explosive' threat of Ghana ace Mubarak Wakaso ahead of Las Palmas tie

title: Eibar coach Jos Mendilibar worried of 'explosive' threat of Ghana ace Mubarak Wakaso ahead of Las Palmas tie
text:
FIFA 2010   18:55 CET Eibar coach José Mendilibar worried of 'explosive' threat of Ghana ace Mubarak Wakaso ahead of Las Palmas tie - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Wakaso, 25, has had an explosive start to life at the Estadio de Gran Canaria where he has shone against giants Barcelona and Sevilla in their last two games. 
The Ghana international has been lethal on the wings where his pace and power has cause many problem to defenders and Eibar coach JosÃ© Luis Mendilibar is worried about the threat of the former Celtic loanee. 
“I don’t know if he will play Wakaso or Culio. They are different. Wakaso is much more explosive and we have to be careful.' 
The Rubin Kazan midfielder is expected to play a key role for the side as they aim for only the second win of the season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
